dict.string:
Have you ever swiped up on the entry field bar's quick compose camera icon only to mistakenly take & send a picture? ...If so then this is for you.
When sliding up, this makes the camera icon require a separate tap before actually sending a picture.
[v.1] Tested on iP6+ 8.1 & 8.4. (9-5-15)
⚑ UPDATES: (3-18-15) *Initial release (9-6-15) *Confirmed working on 8.4
★ If you enjoy my patches, please consider sending a donation...
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
